title: Browser details
description: Detail information related to the browser.

xdm:userAgent.title: User agent
xdm:userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.

xdm:cookiesEnabled.title: Allows cookies
xdm:cookiesEnabled.description: The current user agent settings allow for the writing of cookies.'

xdm:javaScriptEnabled.title: JavaScript enabled
xdm:javaScriptEnabled.description: If JavaScript was enabled in the device this observation was made from.

xdm:javaScriptVersion.title: JavaScript version
xdm:javaScriptVersion.description: The version of JavaScript supported during the observation.

xdm:javaEnabled.title: Java enabled
xdm:javaEnabled.description: If Java was enabled in the device this observation was made from.

xdm:javaVersion.title: Java version
xdm:javaVersion.description: The version of Java supported during the observation.

xdm:quicktimeVersion.title: Quicktime version
xdm:quicktimeVersion.description: The version of Apple Quicktime supported during the observation.

xdm:thirdPartyCookiesEnabled.title: Allows third-party cookies
xdm:thirdPartyCookiesEnabled.description: If third-party cookies were enabled when this observation was made.

xdm:viewportHeight.title: Viewport height
xdm:viewportHeight.description: The vertical size in pixels of the window the experience was displayed inside. For a web view event, the browser viewport height.

xdm:viewportWidth.title: Viewport width
xdm:viewportWidth.description: The horizontal size in pixels of the window the experience was displayed inside. For a web view event, the browser viewport width.
